post:
Virtual Private Servers (VPS) can now be ordered via **Bitcoin** from Evolution Host.

Use your Bitcoins now to avail of HDD or SSD DDoS Protected VPS Hosting. Linux and Windows servers available.

VPS locations available include US and Europe.
Virtual servers start at €5. See €5 packages below:

**HDD Starter VPS**  
1 vCPU  
512MB RAM  
50GB Disk Space  
125Mb/s Port  
1TB Monthly Transfer  
Cost: €5/mo  
Order now: https://evolution-host.com/hdd-vps-hosting.php


**SSD Starter VPS**   
1 vCPU  
512MB RAM  
10GB SSD Storage
125Mb/s Port  
1TB Monthly Transfer  
Cost: €5/mo  
Order now: https://evolution-host.com/ssd-vps-hosting.php

View an overview of our VPS packages here: https://evolution-host.com/vps-hosting.php
